column4: I am having trouble getting the nvidia binary (proprietary) drivers working for an 8600GS card.
I have tried installing the nvidia-glx package and running nvidia-xconfig, but it results in an error upon starting gdm/kdm
Also, I have tried using the nvidia.com proprietary drivers, and get an error  "failed to load the NVIDIA kernel module"
you realize that the 8600GS is not listed  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupportComponentsVideoCardsNvidia
